name: responsive-video-js
description: Make embedded videos responsive, the easy way

scripts.uglify: mkdir -p dist; uglifyjs src/*.js -m -o dist/responsive-video.js; uglifyjs dist/responsive-video.js -m -c -o dist/responsive-video.min.js --support-ie8 --source-map dist/responsive-video.map.js

author: Raed Chammam
